description:
When the trading company office worker Ichimiya Shingo wakes up from his nap he finds himself in an unfamiliar world in the body of a five-year-old boy, Wendelin (Well), from the noble Baumeister family. Though he`s confused at his new surroundings, he`s reassured to learn that he won`t have to worry about food as a noble`s son, but then he learns that he`s actually the eighth son of a poor noble family in remote lands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le huitième fils ? Dites-moi que je rêve !
The 8th Son? Are You Kidding Me?
八男って, それはないでしょう!
